Text: How bad is the flicker? It's quite visible in the very dark sample, and of course, flicker is always much worse in bright scenes.....

Ok, so i answer my own question--flicker is not the worst i've seen but is bad in bright scenes, of which there are many. Hence, this is a CAM not a TS. 

Also, there are NO SUBTITLES FOR THE FOREIGN PARTS.  Hence, this is a total waste of bandwidth, unless you like to ruin good movies.
NO SUBTITLES FOR THE FOREIGN PARTS ,.WASTE OF A GOOD MOVIE.GOOD PICTURE AND AUDIO THOUGH!!!
